treatment.reference: Biosynthetic characterisation of secondary metabolites from stromatolite cyanobacteria Symploca sp. 1013. (Pradhan, N., 2011)
treatment.description: Filamentous cyanobacteria, marine cyanobacterial isolate from from stromatolites in Shark Bay, Western Australia, They are capable of fixing nitrogen aerobically in the light in a light/dark cycle without forming heterocysts, Symploca species are known to synthesise lipopeptides, such as Apramide A, B and G,
